content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello Mary, it's nice to meet you. Let's discuss the rental price for the apartment. What kind of monthly rate are you looking for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for the lowest possible price. I am a student and I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

Mister Heine, I am interested in the apartment, but I need to know the monthly rental price. Can you give me an idea of what you have in mind?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Sure, Mary, based on the size and location of the apartment, I would expect the monthly rental price to be around 800-900 Euros. However, I am open to discussing and negotiating the price to find a mutually agreeable amount. What is your budget and how long are you planning to stay in the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is around 750-800 Euros per month. I will be staying in the apartment for the next year.

Mister Heine, I am willing to negotiate the rental price based on my budget and the length of my stay. Can we come to a mutually beneficial agreement?

The apartment is located in the heart of the city, which makes it very convenient for me. I also appreciate the fact that it has a spacious living room and two bedrooms, which is perfect for a student like me who needs some space to study and relax.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content:
Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Mary. I understand that you are looking for a lower rental price and would like to stay for a year. Based on your budget and the length of your stay, I am willing to negotiate the rental price to find a mutually beneficial agreement.

I propose a monthly rental price of 750 Euros for the apartment. This price takes into account the location of the apartment and the fact that it has two bedrooms and a spacious living room. I believe this price is fair and reasonable, given the market rates in the city.

If you are willing to accept this rental price, I agree to the price of 750 Euros per month. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine
